purpose: Thank webinar attendees and continue building anticipation for Titanverse launch at The Pharmacy Show, driving attendance to Stand D55.
core_message: Thank you to everyone who joined the first webinar. If you missed it, don't miss this. 4 days left until you can see Titanverse in action.
summary: Post-webinar thank you post with continued event promotion, thanking attendees and building anticipation for Pharmacy Show launch.
